snippet: The New York Police Department says it will stock pharmacy shelves with decoy products that contain tracking devices.
abstract: New York Police Department says it will stock pharmacy shelves with decoy pill bottles that contain tracking devices in effort to catch and deter addicts who steal painkillers; response to  increase in pharmacy robberies and burglaries over last decade seems to draw its inspiration from tactic banks use.
lead_paragraph: The New York Police Department says it will stock pharmacy shelves with decoy products that contain tracking devices.

headline.seo: N.Y. Police to Track Drugstore Robbers via Decoy Bottles
headline.main: Police to Use Fake Pill Bottles to Track Drugstore Thieves
headline.print_headline: City Police to Put GPS Devices in Pill Bottles to Find Drugstore Thieves
